snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization VII - VR Official Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
History is in your hands when Sid Meier's Civilization® VII - VR comes to Meta Quest 3 and 3S on April 10, 2025.

Watch the official Gameplay Overview to see how Civilization VII is reimagined as an immersive, tabletop gaming experience in virtual and mixed reality for the first time in franchise history!

► Pre-order now: https://2kgam.es/Civ7VR
► Visit the Game Guide for more on each leader and civ: https://2kgam.es/Civ7GameGuide

The award-winning Civilization strategy series comes to virtual and mixed reality for the first time in franchise history. Developed by PlaySide Studios and published by 2K, experience a revolutionary new chapter with Sid Meier's Civilization® VII - VR, only on Meta Quest 3 and 3S. Immerse yourself as you build an empire to stand the test of time, research technological breakthroughs, and conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations as you explore the far reaches of the unknown world.

-------------------------------------------

https://www.facebook.com/MetaQuestVR

#CivilizationVII #Civ7 #Civ7VR
